PHP.zh_des: Laravel是一个具有表达力、优雅语法的Web应用程序框架。我们已经为你的下一个伟大的想法奠定了基础——让你自由地创作，而不必为小事情流汗。
PHP.name: laravel /laravel
PHP.description: Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax. We’ve already laid the foundation for your next big idea — freeing you to create without sweating the small things.

PHP.zh_des: SecList是安全测试员的同伴。它是在安全评估过程中使用的多种类型的列表的集合，收集在一个地方。列表类型包括用户名、密码、URL、敏感数据模式、模糊有效负载、Web外壳等。
PHP.name: danielmiessler /SecLists
PHP.description: SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

PHP.zh_des: ️Nextcloud服务器，您所有数据的安全之家
PHP.name: nextcloud /server
PHP.description: ☁️ Nextcloud server, a safe home for all your data

PHP.zh_des: 一个Laravel的全栈框架，它省去了构建动态UI的麻烦。
PHP.name: livewire /livewire
PHP.description: A full-stack framework for Laravel that takes the pain out of building dynamic UIs.

PHP.name: nikic /PHP-Parser
PHP.description: A PHP parser written in PHP

PHP.zh_des: 开源、可自行托管的Heroku/Netlify/Vercel替代方案。
PHP.name: coollabsio /coolify
PHP.description: An open-source & self-hostable Heroku / Netlify / Vercel alternative.

PHP.name: firefly-iii /firefly-iii
PHP.description: Firefly III: a personal finances manager

PHP.zh_des: 在提交任何内容(S)之前，您必须签署Adobe贡献者许可协议，该协议可在以下网址获得：https://opensource.adobe.com/cla.html.您向Adobe Inc.及其联属公司、受让人和子公司(统称为“Adobe”)提交的所有材料均受Adobe Contributor许可协议条款的约束。

All Submissions you make to Adobe Inc. and its affiliates, assigns and subsidiaries (collectively “Adobe”) are subject to the terms of the Adobe Contributor License Agreement.

PHP.name: snipe /snipe-it
PHP.description: A free open source IT asset/license management system

PHP.zh_des: Pandora Cloud+Pandora服务器+共享聊天+BackendAPI代理+Chat2API+注册免费=PandoraNext。新的GPTS(Gizmo)用户界面，一应俱全！
PHP.name: pandora-next /deploy
PHP.description: Pandora Cloud + Pandora Server + Shared Chat + BackendAPI Proxy + Chat2API + Signup Free = PandoraNext. New GPTs(Gizmo) UI, All in one!

PHP.zh_des: ⚡️OpenAI PHP是一个由社区维护的超级强大的PHPAPI客户端，它允许您与OpenAI API交互。
PHP.name: openai-php /client
PHP.description: ⚡️ OpenAI PHP is a supercharged community-maintained PHP API client that allows you to interact with OpenAI API.

PHP.zh_des: 官方的NextCloud安装方法。通过该NextCloud实例中包含的大多数功能，提供轻松的部署和维护。
PHP.name: nextcloud /all-in-one
PHP.description: The official Nextcloud installation method. Provides easy deployment and maintenance with most features included in this one Nextcloud instance.

PHP.zh_des: “一人企业方法论”第二版，也适合做其他副业(比如自媒体、电商、数字商品)的非技术人群.

PHP.zh_des: 算一算哪几天你不用工作！
PHP.name: spatie /holidays
PHP.description: Calculate which days you don't have to work!

PHP.zh_des: 一种新的Drupal的原型，基于食谱，并加载了Conrib最好的模块和主题。不是叉子，也不是分销。
PHP.name: phenaproxima /starshot-prototype
PHP.description: Prototype of a new kind of Drupal, based on recipes and loaded up with contrib's best modules and themes. Not a fork or a distribution.
